channel.title: The Tutor House on Sam's Emotions
channel.description: Recent content in The Tutor House on Sam's Emotions

item.title: Day 4
item.description: Iâ€™ve done this previously, namely I found a webscraper online, scrapped some lyrics from some sources, ran some text and sentiment analysis on them and declared that x music is more emotionally expressive than y music. I do sometimes worry about whether the numbers add up. Since then however, the sources have changed considerably and I was not able to use the code I had available to me at the time.
